## PartialDeep type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type PartialDeep<T> = {
  [P in keyof T]?: PartialDeep<T[P]>
}
```
<b>References:</b> [PartialDeep](./types-kit.partialdeep.md)

## Example


```ts
interface Props {
      a: {
        d: number
      };
      b: number;
      c: number;
    };
   // Expect: { a?: { d?: number }; b?: number; c?: number; }
   type NewProps = PartialDeep<Props>;
```
